abstract: House Committee on Ethics confirms for first time that it is investigating Rep Alan Grayson, Democrat of Florida, who has been accused of violating House rules by operating a hedge fund while serving in Congress.
lead_paragraph: The House Committee on Ethics confirmed Monday for the first time that it was investigating Representative Alan Grayson, Democrat of Florida, who has been accused of violating House rules by operating a hedge fund while serving in Congress.

headline.main: House Panel Confirms Inquiry Into Democrat
headline.print_headline: House Panel Confirms Inquiry Into Democrat

snippet: The House Committee on Ethics confirmed Monday for the first time that it was investigating Representative Alan Grayson, Democrat of Florida, who has been accused of violating House rules by operating a hedge fund while serving in Congress.
